pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MULTIÂ·ON API Welcome to the MultiOn API Repository ðŸš€The MultiOn API enables building custom AI Agents & Applications that can take actions on the Web as easy as a few lines of code.See [Examples](https://github.com/MULTI-ON/api/tree/main/examples) to get started.## UseWe provide a Python and JS SDK to build on top of the MultiOn API and can directly be also used from [LangChain](https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/toolkits/multion).**Minimum supported version of langchain to run the langchain examples: v0.0.265**## TermsBy accessing any code provided, you agree to our [Terms of Service](https://www.notion.so/multion/Terms-of-Use-83d64a46cd2c4a66aacff2c29b02ef70).
